history.narrative: Law 4-33 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-3, which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 2, 1981, and June 16, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 8, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-57 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
